attributes.action: Cut CMS costs for the paying parent
attributes.additional_details: paying parents who work overtime and get penalised. Pay tax, national insurance. Not everyone can afford access to there biological children. Mothers who use children as a bargaining tool towards an extra income. Review the pay scale for calculated CMS.
attributes.background:
Review costs for paying parents to CMS. 
Make overtime, mortage, rent, bills, living expenses a recognised outgoing.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Change the way child maintenance is worked out - base on income after deductions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582381

Calculate child maintenance based on actual child expenses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588390

Reform Calculations for Child Maintenance where the child stays with the NRP: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581208

If you want how child maintenance is calculated to be changed in a different way to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like the Government or Parliament to make.
